page.title: 06Activities in Kettlethorpe
page.content: Kettlethorpe Village Hall is the meeting place for several clubs and organisations. Kettlethorpe and District Womens Institute meet there on the third Tuesday of every month at 7.30pm. A childrens playgroup session is held on Tuesday and Thursday mornings. This gives 3 to 5 year old children the opportunity to mix and play together. Fenton and District Youth Club caters for teenagers. They meet weekly and apart from playing records, can enjoy darts,snooker and table tennis. A popmobility class is held on Wednesday evenings, this is exercising to fast, popular music. The Village Hall is run and maintained by a committee,who organise a dance at Christmas and a Harvest supper in September, as well as running monthly bingo sessions and children's discos.
